OCD.name: Slice Table by Time
OCD.description: Slice a table into groups of rows by time.

AD.name: Date/Time Column
AD.description: Column with date/time information for the row.

AD.name: Date/Time Format
AD.description: The format of the date/time. Commonly used are y for year, M for month of year, d for day of month. See http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/api-release/org/joda/time/format/DateTimeFormat.html for details.

AD.name: Slice Into
AD.description: What time interval should the data be sliced into?

AD.name: How Many?
AD.description: Enter the Multiplier for selected Period.

AD.name: From Beginning of Year
AD.description: Enter the year from which slicing will start.

AD.name: To Beginning of Year
AD.description: Enter the year where the slicing should end.

AD.name: Cumulative?
AD.description: Should each slice be cumulative with earlier slices?

AD.name: Align With Calendar
AD.description: Should the intervals be aligned with calendar intervals?

AD.name: Week Starts On
AD.description: What day does the week start on?
